{{Actor| | type = Gore | name = Huge medical tank column | class = Tank3 | game = Strife | doomednum = 211 | convid = 33 }}[[Classes]]: Tank3
A column of three medical tanks filled with liquid, each containing a still-living human body. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Tank3 { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 192 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: TNK3 A 15 TNK3 B 11 TNK3 C 40 Loop } }
